PDS APT Repository

Quick setup for Debian, Ubuntu & derivatives

View on GitHub 
# Add GPG key
curl -fsSL https://{{REPO_OWNER}}.github.io/PDS/pds-repo.gpg | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/pds-repo.gpg >/dev/null

# Add repository
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/pds-repo.gpg] https://{{REPO_OWNER}}.github.io/PDS/apt/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pds-repo.list

# Update and install
sudo apt update
sudo apt install pds

Repository contents

This repository provides the PDS (Portable Deploy Suite) package; a set of Bash helpers for software installation, UI setup, and system deployment.
